summary.what: Graceful degradation: hook command warns instead of erroring when timbers not installed
summary.why: Team members cloning a timbers-enabled repo without timbers installed would get hook errors at every session start, blocking adoption. The git hook already had command -v guard but the Claude Code hook did not.
summary.how: Wrapped hook command in command -v check with friendly install URL fallback. Added isTimbersPrimeCommand() for backward-compat detection of both legacy and resilient formats. Updated DX guide with pattern.
